generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road with double yellow lines and tire tracks, extending into the distance, which is characteristic of a road.
- sidewalk: A sidewalk is visible along the right side of the road, separated by a curb and bordered by grass and snow.
- building: Residential houses are visible on both sides of the street, including multi-story structures.
- vegetation: Trees are visible along the street and in the yards, some bare and some with green foliage.
- terrain: Grass areas with patches of snow are visible along the sidewalk and in the yards.
- sky: The sky is visible above the trees and buildings, clear and blue.
- car: A Mercedes-Benz car is visible from the dashboard view, and other cars are parked or driving on the road.
- pole: Utility poles are visible along the street, supporting wires.
- traffic sign: A stop sign is visible on the right side of the road, mounted on a pole.
- fence: A fence is visible in the background on the left side of the road, near a house.
